General.Name: Farmhouse Inc
General.Description: Farmhouse, Inc. operates a platform for regulated cannabis industry. The company provides The WeedClub, a social networking platform that enables cannabis and hemp professionals to connect, discover products and services, and scale their businesses. Its platform serves cannabis producers, retailers, consultants, and supply chain professionals. The company is based in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 548 Market Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
